review: I'm loving the Amazon Fire TV.  I do have some issues with it but I think it has to do something involving my surround sound system or my internet.  Every now and then it will get a little glitchy and I would have to restart it and that usually gets it working properly again.  If I didn't have to do that then I would give it 5 stars.  I did exchange mine already thinking it was the unit causing that glitch, but it wasn't.  My Bose system remote control can not recognize the Fire TV either so I can't sync it up to that remote.  Other than that I love it.
